Compatible with iOS 7 to 13

Customizer and utility tool for Cydia app with colorful activity indicators, tinted buttons and nav bars, tab bars, separator options, colored status bar, highlighted cells, replaced loading text with over 120 quotes+jokes, and added a firmware faker for fun screenshots of fake jailbreaks.

Configure options from Settings.


See larger Screenshots below..

Backgrounding option added to load sources while multi-tasking.
Compatible up to iOS 13.3.x all devices including A12


Added color options for status bar, navBar, tabBar and itâ€™s items, indexBar and textColor, highlight color options for visited sections and selected colors, 3 separator style options, expanded content view, added compatibility for all devices from iOS 7-11.4. (UIActivityIndicator not colored on iOS 7+8). Also added about 120 random quotes, jokes and emojis to replace the loading text when refreshing or installing packages.
